paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from the study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One of these was BRCA2 c.614delG. Two patients carried this mutation and were related.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation leading to premature termination of protein synthesis.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is noted as a pathogenic mutation.
key_quotes: One of these was BRCA2 c.614delG. Two patients carried this mutation and were related.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Three different BRCA2 mutations were identified in the three BC patients from Poland.
